title: Daily reminder that Cassiopeia needs some kind of help
body: I'm so tired of this I'm not gonna make any large thread. The fact that riot hasn't even addressed the miasma (W) invisible poison bug that's been reported for over a year by players on boards (literally, I see it every day) is enough prove to me that riot couldn't care less about the snake lady and her playerbase. Just let that sink in.

replies.body: You're gonna have to wait until 3 months after worlds for cass buff/rework
